EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Survival is not Mandatory Josh Long_Charlotte_Q317.Charlotte Remin
EmailTemplate.subject: Survival is not Mandatory: Cloud-Native Java with Josh Long | Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you on Monday, August 7th, at the Survival is not Mandatory: Cloud-Native Java event in Charlotte at the NASCAR Hall of Fame (Legends Room).
This is a reminder to leave your laptop at home and enjoy the live coding with Pivotal's Josh Long. Parking is available in the NASCAR Hall of Fame Parking Deck <[[http://www.nascarhall.com/_files/pages/NASCAR-Hall-of-Fame-Parking1.pdf]]> accessible from the entrance at 500 South Brevard Street. Parking is on us, so remember to get your pass validated.
Also, we hope you are able to stick around after for some cocktails & appetizers and to meet Josh!
Date: Monday, August 7, 2017
Time:
12:45PM to 6:00PM
Location: NASCAR Hall of Fame 400 E. MLK Jr. Blvd Charlotte, NC, 28202 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/NASCAR+Hall+of+Fame/@35.2212875,-80.8434273,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0xae5de43691fbcde9?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjR1bbWxr3VAhVI6SYKHcXRB1oQ_BIIkgEwEQ]]>)
If you have any questions or would like additional information about this event please email Anthony Barkley at abarkley@pivotal.io <[[mailto:abarkley@pivotal.io]]>.
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Survival-is-not-Mandatory-Charlotte.html]]>
